name: Acolyte of Nature
description:
Learn one of the following Druid cantrips: Poison Spray, Produce Flame, Shillelagh, Thorn Whip.

Get one of the following proficiencies: Animal Handling, Nature, Survival.

name: Actor
description: You have become a true thespian. Your Charisma increases by 1, to a maximum of 20. Your ProficiencyBonus is doubled for Deception and Performance Checks.

name: Advanced Unarmoured Movement
description: Difficult Terrain doesn't slow you down and you can  Jump (Bonus Action) an additional m=6|ft=20 while you are not wearing armour or using a shield.

name: Agonising Blast
description: When you cast Eldritch Blast, add your Charisma Modifier to the damage it deals, unless it is negative.

name: Alert
description: You gain +5 to Initiative and can no longer be surprised.

name: Arcane Ward
description:
The residual magic of your spells forms a ward around you that protects you from harm.

Each time you cast an Abjuration spell, the intensity of the ward increases by the amount of the spell's Level, up to a maximum of 2x your Wizard level.

Each time you take damage, the ward blocks an amount of damage equal to its intensity, and its intensity decreases by 1.

After each Long Rest, the ward's intensity resets, and becomes the same as your Wizard level.

name: Archery
description: You gain a +2 bonus to Attack Rolls you make with ranged Weapons.

name: Armour of Shadows
description: You can cast Mage Armour on yourself at will, without expending a Spell Slot. Mage Armour increases your Armour Class when you are not wearing armour.

name: Artificer's Lore
description: Add twice your Proficiency Bonus to History checks.

name: Aspect of the Beast (Bear)
description:
The Aspect of the Bear infuses you with strength.

Your Carrying Capacity is doubled, and you have Advantage on Strength Checks.

name: Aspect of the Beast (Chimpanzee)
description:
The Aspect of the Chimpanzee grants you a nimble mischievousness.

You gain Resistance to Falling damage, and throwing camp supplies Blinds targets.

name: Aspect of the Beast (Crocodile)
description:
The Aspect of the Crocodile increases your agility in the water.

Your Movement Speed increases by m=3|ft=10 while standing in water-based surfaces.

On slippery surfaces, you also have Advantage on Saving Throws against being knocked Prone

name: Aspect of the Beast (Eagle)
description:
The Aspect of the Eagle enhances your eyesight.

You can see in the dark up to m=12|ft=40, and gain Advantage on Perception Checks.

name: Aspect of the Beast (Elk)
description:
The Aspect of the Elk grants you astounding swiftness.

You can use Aspect of the Elk, giving yourself and nearby allies extra Movement Speed.

name: Aspect of the Beast (Honey Badger)
description: If you're Poisoned, Frightened, or Charmed at the start of your turn, you have a 50% chance to begin Raging without expending a Rage Charge.
image: Aspect of the Beast Honey Badger.webp

name: Aspect of the Beast (Stallion)
description:
The Aspect of the Stallion creates safety in movement.

Dashing grants you temporary hit points equal to twice your Barbarian level.

Can only have temporary hit points from one source.

name: Aspect of the Beast (Tiger)
description:
The Aspect of the Tiger infuses you with an unrelenting ferocity.

You add an additional Strength Modifier to Attack Rolls against Bleeding or Poisoned targets, and gain Proficiency in Survival

name: Aspect of the Beast (Wolf)
description:
The Aspect of the Wolf boosts your stealthiness.

You gain Proficiency in Stealth, and can use Aspect of the Wolf.

name: Aspect of the Beast (Wolverine)
description:
The Aspect of the Wolverine grants you the tools to relentlessly pursue your prey.

When you attack a Bleeding or Poisoned target, you also Maim it for 1 turn

name: Assassin's Alacrity
description: Quick as an alley cat in a rain-dark city, you immediately restore your action and bonus at the start of combat

name: Assassinate: Ambush
description: Any successful Attack Roll against a Surprised creature is a Critical Hit.

name: Assassinate: Initiative
description: You are deadliest against unprepared enemies. In combat, you have Advantage on Attack Rolls against creatures that haven't taken a turn yet.

name: Athlete: Standing Up
description: When you are Prone, standing up uses significantly less movement. Your Jump distance also increases by 50%.

name: Beast Speech
description: You can cast Speak with Animals on yourself at will, without expending a Spell Slot.

name: Beast Tamer
description: You have cultivated a strong bond with animals. You can cast Find Familiar without expending a spell slot.

name: Beguiling Defences
description: You have built stoic barriers in your heart and mind, and cannot be Charmed.

name: Beguiling Influence
description: You invoke your patron's bewitching charm. You gain Proficiency in the Deception and Persuasion.

name: Bestial Fury
description: Grants all your companions an extra attack.

name: Blessed Healer
description:
Healing others heals you as well.

When you cast a healing spell of Level 1 or higher on another creature, you regain hit points equal to 2 + the spell's level|Healing.

name: Book of Ancient Secrets
description:
You can inscribe magical rituals in your Book of Shadows. Gain Ray of Sickness, Chromatic Orb, and Silence spells.

You can cast them once per Long Rest and they don't expend spell slots

name: Bounty Hunter
description: Gain Proficiency in Investigation. Creatures you hit with Ensnaring Strike (either ranged or melee) have Disadvantage on their Saving Throw.

name: Brave
description: You have Advantage on Saving Throws against Frightened.

name: Brutal Critical
description: You've trained to strike swift and true. When you land a Critical Hit, you roll an extra damage die as well as the normal additional critical die.

name: Civil Militia
description: You have Weapon Proficiency with spears, pikes, halberds, and glaives, and Armour Proficiency with Light Armour and Shields.

name: Colossus Slayer
description: Once per turn, your weapon attack deals an extra 1d8|Physical|drs=t damage if the target is below its hit point maximum.

name: Companion's Bond
description: Your Summoned Companions receive a bonus to Armour Class, damage, and Attack Rolls (even though this is not stated) equal to your ProficiencyBonus.

name: Crossbow Expert: Point-Blank
description: When you make crossbow attacks within melee range, the Attack Rolls do not have Disadvantage.

name: Crossbow Expert: Wounding
description: Your Piercing Shot inflicts Gaping Wounds for twice as long.

name: Danger Sense
description:
You sense when things aren't as they should be. 

You have Advantage on Dexterity Saving Throws against traps, Spells and surfaces. 

To gain this benefit, you can't be Blinded or Incapacitated.

name: Dark One's Blessing
description: Whenever you reduce a hostile creature to 0 Hit Points, this gift from your patron grants you Charisma Modifier + Warlock Level temporary hit points.

name: Dark One's Own Luck
description: Call on your patron to change your fate and add a {{DieIcon|d10|Physical1d10}} to an  Ability Check.

name: Darkvision
description: Can see in the dark up to 12m.

name: Defence
description: You gain a +1 bonus to Armour Class while wearing Armour.

name: Destroy Undead
description: When you successfully Turn an Undead creature, it also takes 4d6|Radiant damage.

name: Devil's Sight
description: You can see normally in darkness, both magical and non-magical, to a distance ofm=24|ft=80.

name: Disciple of Life
description: Your devotion empowers your healing Spells. When casting a healing spell, the target regains additional hit points equal to 2 + the spell's level|Healing.

name: Divine Health
description: The divine magic flowing within you prevents disease from affecting you.

name: Draconic Ancestry (Acid)
description: The blood of ancient dragons flow through your veins. You are Resistant to Acid damage.

name: Draconic Ancestry (Cold)
description: The blood of ancient dragons flow through your veins. You are Resistant to Cold damage.

name: Draconic Ancestry (Fire)
description: The blood of ancient dragons flow through your veins. You are Resistant to Fire damage.

name: Draconic Ancestry (Poison)
description: The blood of ancient dragons flow through your veins. You are Resistant to Poison damage.

name: Draconic Ancestry: Black (Acid)
description: At Level 6, spells that deal Acid damage are more powerful, and you can become Acid|Resistant to Acid damage.

name: Draconic Ancestry: Blue (Lightning)
description: At Level 6, spells that deal Lightning damage are more powerful, and you can become Lightning|Resistant to Lightning damage.

name: Draconic Ancestry: Brass (Fire)
description: At Level 6, spells that deal Fire damage are more powerful, and you can become Fire|Resistant to Fire damage.

name: Draconic Ancestry: Bronze (Lightning)
description: At Level 6, spells that deal Lightning damage are more powerful, and you can become Lightning|Resistant to Lightning damage.

name: Draconic Ancestry: Copper (Acid)
description: At Level 6, spells that deal Acid damage are more powerful, and you can become Acid|Resistant to Acid damage.

name: Draconic Ancestry: Gold (Fire)
description: At Level 6, spells that deal Fire damage are more powerful, and you can become Fire|Resistant to Fire damage.

name: Draconic Ancestry: Green (Poison)
description: At Level 6, spells that deal Poison damage are more powerful, and you can become Poison|Resistant to Poison damage.

name: Draconic Ancestry: Red (Fire)
description: At Level 6, spells that deal Fire damage are more powerful, and you can become Fire|Resistant to Fire damage.

name: Draconic Ancestry: Silver (Cold)
description: At Level 6, spells that deal Cold damage are more powerful, and you can become Cold|Resistant to Cold damage.

name: Draconic Ancestry: White (Cold)
description: At Level 6, spells that deal Cold damage are more powerful, and you can become Cold|Resistant to Cold damage.

name: Draconic Resilience
description: Dragon-like scales cover parts of your skin. When you aren't wearing armour, your base Armour Class is 13.

name: Draconic Resilience: Hit Points
description: Your Hit Point maximum increases by 1 for each Sorcerer level.
image: Draconic Resilience Hit Points Icon Small.png

name: Dread Ambusher
description:
You specialise in taking out foes swiftly and ruthlessly.

You gain a +3 bonus to Initiative.

On the first turn of combat, your Movement Speed increases by m=3|ft=10, and you can make an attack that deals an additional d8|Physical1d8 damage

name: Dreadful Word
description: You can cast Confusion with a Warlock spell slot.

name: Drow Weapon Training
description: You have Proficiency with the Rapier, Shortsword, and Hand Crossbow.

name: Dual Wielder
description: You can use Two-Weapon Fighting even if the weapons you are wielding aren't Light. You cannot dual-wield Heavy weapons.

name: Dual Wielder: Bonus Armour Class
description: You have a +1 bonus to Armour Class while wielding a melee weapon in each hand.

name: Duelling
description: When you are wielding a melee weapon that is not Two-Handed or Versatile in one hand, and no weapon in the other, you deal an additional 2 damage with that weapon.You can carry a shield in your free hand and still gain this bonus.

name: Duergar Resilience
description: You have Advantage on Saving Throws  against illusions and against being Charmed or Paralysed.

name: Dungeon Delver: Perception
description: You have Advantage on Perception Checks made to detect hidden objects.

name: Dungeon Delver: Resist Traps
description: You have Advantage on Saving Throws made to avoid traps and Resistance to trap damage.

name: Durable
description: Regain full Hit Points every time you take a Short Rest.

name: Dwarven Armour Training
description: You have Armour Proficiency with Light and Medium Armour.

name: Dwarven Combat Training
description: You have Proficiency with the Battleaxe, Handaxe, Light Hammer, and Warhammers.

name: Dwarven Resilience
description: You have Advantage on Saving Throws against being Poisoned, and you have Resistance against Poison damage.

name: Dwarven Toughness
description: You have 1 extra maximum Hit Points per level.

name: Eldritch Strike
description: When you hit a creature with a weapon attack, it has Disadvantage on its next Saving Throw against a spell you cast before the end of your next turn.

name: Elemental Adept: Acid
description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Acid damage. In addition, when you deal Acid damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

name: Elemental Adept: Cold
description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Cold damage. In addition, when you deal Cold damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

name: Elemental Adept: Fire
description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Fire damage. In addition, when you deal Fire damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

name: Elemental Adept: Lightning
description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Lightning damage. In addition, when you deal Lightning damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

name: Elemental Adept: Thunder
description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Thunder damage. In addition, when you deal Thunder damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

name: Elemental Affinity: Damage
description: When you cast a spell that deals damage of the type associated with your draconic ancestry, you add your Charisma Modifier to the damage

name: Elven Weapon Training
description: You have Proficiency with the Longsword, Shortsword, Shortbow, and Longbow.

name: Empowered Evocation
description: Your grasp of Evocation magic has tightened, and you can add your Intelligence Modifier to damage rolls with any Evocation spells.

name: Escape the Horde
description: Opportunity Attacks against you have Disadvantage.

name: Evasion
description: Your agility lets you dodge out of the way of certain spells. When a spell or effect would deal half damage on a successful Dexterity Saving Throw, it deals no damage if you succeed, and only half damage if you fail.

name: Exceptional Training
description: Your summoned companions can now Dash, Disengage, and Help as a bonus.

name: Experimental Alchemy
description: You brew two Alchemical Solutions instead of one when combining extracts, if you succeed a Difficulty Class 15 Medicine Check.

name: Expert Divination
description: You may gain an additional Portent Die: when taking a Short Rest you receive a Prophecy. Complete it to regain a missing Portent Die.

name: Extra Attack
description: You can make an additional free attack after making an unarmed or weapon attack.

name: Extra Attack (Familiar)
description: Your familiar can make an additional free attack after making an unarmed or weapon attack.

name: Fast Hands
description: You gain an extra bonus, which you can use with any of your existing Bonus Actions.

name: Fast Movement
description: Your Movement Speed increases by m=3|ft=10 while not wearing Heavy Armour.

name: Feral Instinct
description:
You have honed your instincts to the utmost degree.

You gain a +3 to Initiative and can't be Surprised.

name: Fey Ancestry
description: The Feywild casts a veil over your mind. You have Advantage on SavingThrows against being Charmed, and magic can't put you to Sleep.

name: Fiendish Vigour
description: You can cast False Life on yourself at will as a 1st-level spell, without expending a Spell Slot. False Life grants you 7 Temporary Hit Points|Healing.

name: Focused Conjuration
description: Damage taken while you are Concentrating on a Conjuration spell will not break your Concentration.

name: Font of Inspiration
description: You regain all of your bi|forceplural=yes after a Long or Short Rest.

name: Gnome Cunning
description: You have Advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma Saving Throws.

name: Great Weapon Fighting
description: When you roll a 1 or 2 on a damage die for an attack with a Two-Handed melee weapon, that die is rerolled once.

name: Great Weapon Master: All In
description: When attacking with Heavy melee weapons you are Proficient with, Attack Rolls take a -5 penalty, but their damage increases by 10.

name: Great Weapon Master: Bonus Attack
description: When you land a Critical Hit or kill a target with a melee weapon attack, you can make another melee weapon attack as a bonus that turn.

name: Grim Harvest
description: Once per turn, if you kill a creature with a spell, you regain Hit Points equal to twice the Spell Slot level used - thrice if it's a Necromancy spell. Undead and Constructs are unaffected.

name: Halfling Luck
description: When you roll a 1 for an Attack Roll, Ability Check, or Saving Throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

name: Heart of the Storm: Resistance
description: You are Resistant to Lightning and Thunder damage

name: Heavily Armoured
description:
You gain Proficiency with Heavy Armour and your Strength increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

You must have Medium Armor Proficiency before you can take this feat.

name: Heavy Armour Master
description:
Your Strength increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Incoming damage from non-magical attacks also decreases by 3 while you're wearing heavy armour.

Category:Sources of damage reduction

Requires Proficiency with Heavy Armour

name: Hellish Resistance
description: Your blood protects you from flame, abyssal or otherwise. Gain Resistance to Fire damage, taking only half damage from it.

name: Horde Breaker
description: Target two creatures standing close to each other, attacking them in quick succession.

name: Human Versatility
description: Select an additional Skill to be Proficient in. Your carrying capacity is increased by a quarter.

name: Improved Abjuration
description: Each time you take a Short Rest, the intensity of your Arcane Ward increases by an amount equal to your wizard level.

name: Improved Combat Superiority
description: The size of your supdie increases to a d10|Physical d10

name: Improved Critical Hit
description: The number you need to roll a Critical Hit while attacking is reduced by 1. This effect can stack.

name: Improved Elemental Casting
description:
Your affinity with elemental ki deepens. Several of your offensive Four Elements features deal an additional dice of damage, your Clench of the North Wind can hold an additional creature, and your Embrace of the Inferno fires an extra ray.

* Fist of Four Thunders damage increases to 3d8|Thunder (from 2d8)
* Fist of Unbroken Air damage increases to 4d10|Bludgeoning (from 3d10)
* Sweeping Cinder Strike damage increases to 4d6|Fire (from 3d6)
* Touch of the Storm damage increases to 2d10|Lightning (from 1d10)
* Water Whip damage increases to 4d10|Thunder (from 3d10)
* Clench of the North Wind can hold an additional creature.
* Embrace of the Inferno fires an additional ray.
* Gong of the Summit damage increases to 4d8|Thunder (from 3d8)

name: Improved Extra Attack
description: You can make two additional attacks after attacking with your main-hand weapon.

name: Improved Warding Flare
description: When an enemy attacks an ally, you can use your reaction to impose Disadvantage on the Attack Roll, possibly causing their attack to miss.

name: Inured to Undeath
description: You have steeped yourself so completely in death that you are Resistant to Necrotic damage, and moreover your hit point maximum cannot be reduced.

name: Iron Mind
description: You gain Proficiency in Wisdom and Intelligence SavingThrows.

name: Jack of All Trades
description: Your vast experiences make you more likely to succeed in any undertaking. Add half of your Proficiency Bonus (rounded down) to Ability Checks that you are not Proficient in.

name: Keeper of the Veil
description: You specialise in hunting creatures from other planes of existence. You gain Proficiency in Arcana and can grant protection against aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead.

name: Ki-Empowered Strikes
description: Your unarmed attacks count as magical for the purpose of overcoming enemies' Resistance and Immunity to non-magical damage.

name: Land's Stride: Difficult Terrain
description: Difficult Terrain no longer slows you down.

name: Lifedrinker
description: Add your Charisma modifier to the damage of your melee weapon attacks.

name: Lightly Armoured
description: You gain Armour Proficiency with Light Armour and your Strength and Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

name: Mage Breaker
description: You have a history of battling spellcasters. Gain Proficiency with Arcana and the True Strike, which gives you Advantage on Attack Rolls against a creature. Wisdom is your Spellcasting Ability for this spell.

name: Mage Hand Legerdemain
description:
Your mage hand can stow away or retrieve objects carried by other creatures and use Thieves' Tools at range.
* There is no longer a time limit, and the Mage Hand lasts forever until destroyed or dismissed.
* The Mage Hand is now permanently Invisible.

name: Magic Initiate: Bard
description: You learn 2 cantrips and a Level 1 spell from the Bard spell list. You can cast the Level 1 spell once per Long Rest. Your Spellcasting Modifier for all 3 spells is Charisma.

name: Magic Initiate: Cleric
description: You learn 2 cantrips and a Level 1 spell from the Cleric spell list. You can cast the Level 1 spell once per Long Rest. Your Spellcasting Modifier for all 3 spells is Wisdom.

name: Magic Initiate: Druid
description: You learn 2 cantrips and a Level 1 spell from the Druid spell list. You can cast the Level 1 spell once per Long Rest. Your Spellcasting Modifier for all 3 spells is Wisdom.

name: Magic Initiate: Sorcerer
description: You learn 2 cantrips and a Level 1 spell from the Sorcerer spell list. You can cast the Level 1 spell once per Long Rest. Your Spellcasting Modifier for all 3 spells is Charisma.

name: Magic Initiate: Warlock
description: You learn 2 cantrips and a Level 1 spell from the Warlock spell list. You can cast the Level 1 spell once per Long Rest. Your Spellcasting Modifier for all 3 spells is Charisma.

name: Magic Initiate: Wizard
description: You learn 2 cantrips and a Level 1 spell from the Wizard spell list. You can cast the Level 1 spell once per Long Rest. Your Spellcasting Modifier for all 3 spells is Intelligence.

name: Magical Ambush
description: While you are Hiding, your targets have Disadvantage on SavingThrows against your Spells.

name: Manifestation of Body
description: Your hands sap the ki from your enemies' bodies. Your unarmed attacks deal an additional 1d4 + Wisdom Modifier|Necrotic damage.

name: Manifestation of Mind
description: Your hands sap the ki from your enemies' bodies. Your unarmed attacks deal an additional 1d4 + Wisdom Modifier|Psychic damage.

name: Manifestation of Soul
description: Your hands sap the ki from your enemies' bodies. Your unarmed attacks deal an additional 1d4 + Wisdom Modifier|Radiant damage.

name: Martial Adept
description: Learn two manoeuvres from the Battle Master archetype and receive 1 (additional) supdie to fuel them. You regain expended Superiority Dice after a Short or Long Rest.

name: Martial Arts: Bonus Unarmed Strike
description: After making an attack with a Monk Weapon or while unarmed, you can make another unarmed attack as a bonus action.

name: Martial Arts: Deft Strikes
description: Attacks with Monk Weapons and unarmed attacks deal 1d4|Bludgeoning damage, unless their normal damage is higher.

name: Martial Arts: Dextrous Attacks
description: Attacks with Monk Weapons and unarmed attacks scale with your Dexterity instead of your Strength if your Dexterity is higher.

name: Martial Prodigy
description: A lifetime of relentless training gave you Armor Proficiency with Light and Medium Armour, as well as Proficiency with the Shortsword, Longsword, and Greatsword.

name: Mask of Many Faces
description: You can cast Disguise Self on yourself at will, without expending a Spell Slot.

name: Medium Armour Master
description:
When you wear medium armour, it doesn't impose Disadvantage on Stealth checks. The bonus to Armour Class you can gain from your Dexterity modifier also becomes +3 instead of +2.

You must have Proficiency in Medium Armor to take this feat

name: Metamagic: Careful Spell
description:
Allies automatically succeed Saving Throws against spells that required them.

Costs 1 sp|1 per spell.

name: Metamagic: Distant Spell
description:
Increases the range of the spell by 50%. Spells with a range of m=1.5|ft=5 are increased to m=9|ft=30.

Costs 1 sp|1 per spell.

name: Metamagic: Extended Spell
description:
Double the duration of Conditions, summons, and surfaces caused by spells.

Costs 1 sp|1 per spell.

name: Metamagic: Heightened Spell
description:
Targets of spells that require Saving Throws have Disadvantage on their first Saving Throw.

Costs sp|3 per spell.

name: Metamagic: Quickened Spell
description:
Spells that take an action take a bonus instead.

Costs sp|3 per spell.

name: Metamagic: Subtle Spell
description:
You can cast spells while Silenced.

Costs 1 sp per spell.

name: Metamagic: Twinned Spell
description:
Spells that only target 1 creature can target an additional creature.

Costs 1 sp|1 per Spell Slot level used. Cantrips also cost 1 sp|1.

For spells that don't shoot a projectile, the targets need to be close enough together.

name: Mindless Rage
description:
Your rage becomes all-consuming, repelling outside influence.

While Frenzied, you can't be Charmed or Frightened, and Calm Emotions no longer ends your rage.

name: Minions of Chaos
description: You can cast Conjure Elemental with a Warlock spell slot.

name: Mire the Mind
description: You can cast Slow with a Warlock spell slot.

name: Mobile: Evade Difficult Terrain
description: When you Dash, Difficult Terrain doesn't slow you down.

name: Mobile: Evade Opportunity Attack
description:
If you move after making a melee attack, you don't provoke Opportunity Attacks from your target.

The effect still works if your attack misses.

name: Moderately Armoured
description:
You gain Proficiency with Medium Armour and Shields, and your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

You must have Light Armor Proficiency before you can take this feat.

name: Mortal Reminder
description: When you land a Critical Hit against a creature, that creature and any nearby enemies must succeed a Wisdom Saving Throw or become Frightened until the end of their next turn.

name: Multiattack Defence
description: When a enemy attacks you, they suffer -4 penalty to additional Attack Rolls against you until start of their next turn.

name: Naturally Stealthy
description: Your nimble nature makes you skilled at concealment. You have Advantage on Stealth Checks.

name: Nature's Ward
description: You can't be Charmed or Frightened by elementals and fey. Disease and poison also no longer affect you.

name: One with Shadows
description: You learn how to cast One with Shadows.

name: Otherworldly Leap
description: You can cast Enhance Leap as a ritual spell out-of-combat, but it does expend a Warlock slot to cast in turn-based mode.As of 4.1.1.3748643. This may be a bug.

name: Pact of the Blade (passive feature)
description:
You can Summon a pact weapon, or Bind the one you are wielding as one, making it magical.

Pact weapons use the wielder's Spellcasting Ability Modifier instead of Strength or Dexterity.
image: Pact of the Blade Passive Feature.webp

name: Pact of the Chain
description:
Gain the service of a familiar, a fey spirit that takes a form of your choosing. This can be an animal, imp, or quasit.

Grants:
* Find Familiar
* Find Familiar: Imp
* Find Familiar: Quasit

name: Pact of the Tome
description: Your patron grants you a grimoire called "The Book of Shadows", which allows you to cast Guidance, Vicious Mockery, and Thorn Whip.

name: Polearm Master: Bonus Attack
description:
When attacking with a Glaive, Halberd, Quarterstaff, or Spear, you can use a Bonus Action to attack with the butt of your weapon. 
This attack does 1d4|Bludgeoning|modifier=melee

name: Polearm Master: Opportunity Attack
description: You can also make an Opportunity Attack when a target comes within range.

name: Potent Cantrip
description:
Your cantrips become harder to evade entirely.

When a creature succeeds its SavingThrow against one of your cantrips, it still takes half the cantrip's damage, but suffers no additional effects.

name: Potent Spellcasting
description:
Your god grants you even more intense power.

You can add your Wisdom Modifier to the damage you deal with Cleric cantrips.

name: Primal Strike
description: While in beast form, your attacks count as magical for the purpose of overcoming Resistance and Immunity to non-magical damage.

name: Purity of Body
description: You are Immune to Poison damage and can't be Poisoned or affected by disease thanks to the purifying ki flowing through your meridians.

name: Ranger Knight
description: You have sworn to serve a crown or nation and seek to bring its foes to ruin. Gain Proficiency with History and Proficiency with Heavy Armour.

name: Relentless Avenger
description: If you hit an enemy with an Opportunity Attack, your movement speed increases by 4.5m / 15ft on your next turn.

name: Relentless Rage
description: Once per Short Rest, if you drop to 0 hit point while Enraged, you regain 1|Healing instead of being Downed.

name: Reliable Talent
description: When you make an Ability Check with a Skill you are Proficient with, the lowest result you can roll on the die is 10.

name: Remarkable Athlete: Jump
description: You're a master of your own body, your athletic prowess extended beyond the usual. Your Jump distance is increased by m=3|ft=10.

name: Remarkable Athlete: Proficiency
description: You're a master of your own body, your athletic prowess extended beyond the usual. You can add half of your Proficiency Bonus to any Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution Checks that you are not Proficient in.

name: Repelling Blast
description: When you hit a creature with Eldritch Blast, you can push the creature up to m=4.5|ft=15 away from you.

name: Resilient
description:
You increase an Ability by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Gain Proficiency in that ability's SavingThrow.

name: Ritual Caster: Free Spells
description:
You learn two  Ritual Spells of your choice from the following: 
* Speak with Dead
* Find Familiar
* Longstrider
* Enhance Leap
* Disguise Self
* Speak with Animals

name: Sanctified Stalker
description: You swore to hunt the enemies of a holy or druidic order. You gain Proficiency in Religion and can cast Sacred Flame.

name: Savage Attacker
description: When making melee weapon attacks, you roll your damage dice twice and use the highest result.

name: Savage Attacks
description: When you land a Critical Hit with a melee weapon attack, you deal an extra dice of weapon damage.

name: Sculpt Spells
description: Create pockets of safety within your Evocation spells. Allies automatically succeed their SavingThrows against these spells and take no damage from them.

name: Sculptor of Flesh
description: You can cast Polymorph with a Warlock spell slot.

name: Second-Story Work
description: You've mastered the art of falling and gain Resistance to Falling damage.

name: Sentinel: Opportunity Advantage
description: You gain Advantage on Opportunity Attacks.

name: Sentinel: Snare
description: When you hit a creature with an Opportunity Attack, it can no longer move for the rest of its turn.

name: Sentinel: Vengeance
description: When an enemy in melee range attacks an ally, you can use a Reaction to make a weapon attack against that enemy. Target ally must not have the Sentinel feat.

name: Sharpshooter: All In
description: Ranged weapon attacks with weapons you are Proficient with have a -5 penalty to their Attack Roll, but deal an additional 10 damage.

name: Sharpshooter: Low Ground
description: Your ranged weapon attacks are not penalized for High Ground Rules.

name: Shield Master
description: Gain a +2 bonus to Dexterity SavingThrows when wielding a Shield.

name: Sign of Ill Omen
description: You can cast Bestow Curse with a Warlock Spell Slot.

name: Skilled
description: You gain Proficiency in 3 Skills of your choice.

name: Spell Sniper
description:
You learn a cantrip, and the number you need to roll a Critical Hit while attacking with a Spell is reduced by 1. This effect can stack.

The cantrip must be one of:
* Bone Chill
* Eldritch Blast
* Fire Bolt
* Ray of Frost
* Shocking Grasp
* Thorn Whip

name: Split Enchantment
description: You know your enchantments inside and out. You can target 2 creatures with Enchantment spells that would normally only target 1 creature.

name: Spreading Spores (passive feature)
description: While Symbiotic Entity is active, you can create a cloud of Spreading Spores.

name: Stalker's Flurry
description: When you miss with a weapon attack, you can make another one for free.

name: Steel Will
description: Advantage on SavingThrows against being Frightened.

name: Stillness of Mind
description: If you are Charmed or Frightened, you automatically cast Stillness of Mind to remove the condition.

name: Stone Camouflage
description: You have Advantage on Stealth checks.

name: Strongheart Resilience
description: You have Advantage on Saving Throws against Poison and Resistance to Poison damage.

name: Superior Darkvision
description: Can see in the dark up to 24m.

name: Tavern Brawler
description:
Increase your Strength or Constitution by 1, to a maximum of 20.

When you make an unarmed attack, use an improvised weapon, or throw something, your Strength Modifier is added twice to the damage and Attack Rolls.Bug

name: Tempestuous Magic
description: After you cast a Level 1 Spell or higher you can Fly as a Bonus Action up to ft=30 until the end of your turn without receiving Opportunity Attacks.

name: Thief of Five Fates
description:
Once per Long Rest, you can cast Bane using a Warlock Spell Slot.

Bane targets up to 3 creatures. They receive a 1d4 penalty to Attack Rolls and Saving Throws.

name: Thought Shield: Psychic Reflection
description: Your patron doesn't appreciate attempts to attack your mind. When you take Psychic damage, your attacker takes the same damage.

name: Thought Shield: Psychic Resistance
description: An elder being shields your brain. You gain Resistance to Psychic damage.

name: Tough
description: Your Hit Point maximum increases by 2 for every level you have gained.

name: Tranquility
description: Long_rest_iconLong Rests surround you with an aura of peace, granting you Sanctuary permanently until you attack.

name: Two-Weapon Fighting
description: When you make an offhand attack, you can add your Ability Score Modifier to the damage of the attack.

name: Unarmoured Defence (Barbarian)
description: Your body is as resilient as any armour. While not wearing armour, you add your Constitution Modifier to your Armour Class. Wearing Heavy Armour impedes your Rage.

name: Unarmoured Defence (Monk)
description: Your reflexes are as effective as any armour. While not wearing armour, you add your Wisdom Modifier to your Armour Class.

name: Unarmoured Movement
description: Your movement speed increases by m=3|ft=10 while you are not wearing armour or using a shield.

name: Uncanny Dodge
description: Use your lightning-quick reflexes to protect yourself. When an attack hits you, you only take half the usual damage.

name: Undead Thralls: Additional Undead
description: When you use Animate Dead, you can raise an additional corpse.

name: Undead Thralls: Better Summons
description: Creatures created with Animate Dead have additional hit points equal to your wizard level, and your Proficiency Bonus is added to their damage.

name: Urban Tracker
description: An expert at navigating the wild within the city, you gain Sleight of Hand Proficiency.

name: War Caster: Concentration
description: You gain Advantage on SavingThrows to maintain Concentration on a Spell.

name: War Magic
description: You have honed your body and magic for war. After you cast a cantrip, you can make a weapon attack using a bonus.

name: Wasteland Wanderer: Cold
description: You have spent endless days surviving desolate tundras. Gain resistance to Cold damage, taking only half damage from it.

name: Wasteland Wanderer: Fire
description: You have spent endless days surviving forbidding deserts. Gain resistance to Fire, taking only half damage from it.

name: Wasteland Wanderer: Poison
description: You have spent endless days surviving fetid swamps. Gain resistance to Poison, taking only half damage from it.

name: Weapon Master
description:
Increase your Strength or Dexterity by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Gain Proficiency with four Weapon types of your choice.

name: Whispers of the Grave
description: You can cast Speak with Dead without expending a Spell Slot.

name: Wild Magic (passive feature)
description:
Unruly magic sparks and fizzes through your veins. Each time you cast a spell of Level 1 or higher, your magic might surge and trigger a random magic effect.

{| class="wikitable mw-collapsible } | one = mw-collapsed | 1 = mw-collapsed | mw-expanded}}" style="width: 100%;"

name: Wild Strike
description: You can make an additional attack after making an unarmed strike while in wildshape.
